runs.comm: good length ball, turning just a touch on middle. Defended off the back foot
gets a thick outside edge as he was looking to nudge the good length ball towards midwicket
flatter ball on off stump, he rocks back and pulls to the square leg boundary
stays on the back foot despite a bit of flight on off stump, pushed down to mid-on
this is biiiiiig! Goes down on one-knee and smacks this way into the crowd behind midwicket. One-handed  catch in the crowd as this slog sweep epitomises Finch's power
nudged off the pads towards square leg to keep strike
fullish on off stump, walks down the pitch and clips it away through midwicket
135kph, doesn't move his feet much as he dabs this length ball into the covers
short and wide and Warner slaps this through the hands of cover point. Stand and delivery stuff. Doesn't even bother running
tighter line on off stump as the back of a length ball is defended down the pitch
tucks him up on middle and leg, Warner nudges into the leg side and though Al-Amin chases after it and sends in a throw at the keeper's end, Finch was well home
shortish in length as he angles this in at him. Finch is on the back foot and whips behind square leg. Don't think there was bat involved though
flatter ball on middle, Finch goes back and picks it away to midwicket
prefers to wait on the back foot as he turns it away to short fine leg. Warner calls it through for a single
no spin on this one and with Warner keeping to the back foot and flicks through midwicket
goes back and punches the length ball, with no spin, down the ground to long-on
a little more flight on this as he targets off stump, Warner comes forward to block and gets it off the outside edge. Bit more bounce and turn on this
good length ball tucked away with the angle towards square leg
flighted on middle, Finch sweeps to square leg. Hint of turn on offer for the left-arm spinner
this dipped a bit on him, but Warner has whipped this to the square leg boundary. Excellent placement
good length ball on off stump, nudged away into the leg side
bounce for Shakib, hits Mushi on the left bicep! Warner was outside his crease just for an instant, but he pushed his back leg to safety

skips down the track and swings with the turn, but this one doesn't. Gets a leading edge that gains far more height than Warner would like. Anamul was running back from mid-on and despite a flailing dive, he can't get a hand to it
changes his grip, switches right-handed and sweeps him to third man. The bowler had pulled his length back, but that just allowed him to get under it
flights it on middle and blocks nicely
switch hit again, but this time he can't connect with a late cut. He wanted to switch hit it to third man, but when he saw the bowler pulling his length back he adjusted his shot, but misses
short ball outside off, Warner is deep in his crease and crunches it through the covers
goes back and flicks the length ball through midwicket
keeps out a fuller delivery angled at the stumps
lands this short on leg stump and Warner pulls it to deep square leg
this was much slower, but his length isn't quite the best. Sat up for Finch who goes deep in his crease and bludgeons it through the covers
slows it up again and this time he flights it, which fetches him a moral victory. Went on with the arm as well, and Finch gets an inside edge to the fine leg boundary
flighted on middle, comes forward to block
hoisted over extra cover and he collects the most casual six. Made room for himself and gave it direction, was all he did
drags his length back and he was waiting for it, dabs towards point for a single
135kph, shortish and just outside off, Finch doesn't have enough room to cut and is beaten
short again, this time on middle, and Finch pulls to deep midwicket
short of a good length, but on leg stump. Warner would be disappointed at not connecting the half-sweep well enough to beat short fine leg
slower ball, goes down the leg side. Finch wants to pinch a single. Might be tight with a direct hit, third umpire is called in to adjudicate. He's quite safe
slapped through the covers as this is full and outside off
140kph, fuller delivery angled at the pads, and that is where it deflects off. Single to short fine leg
too straight and Warner slog sweeps him miles past the square leg boundary. Picked it early, got under it and struck it powerfully
flatter ball on middle, Warner's pull only ends up an inside edge onto pad
adjusts himself for the flatter ball this time as he bends his knees and pulls well to the right of short fine leg
big shot as the batsman shoulders arms, but this was sliding down leg. Warner thought this would have been a wide
flighted outside leg, and he sweeps to short fine leg
keeps the dart to outside off stump and Warner chops to point. An unnecessary throw results in an extra run
extracts a bit more bounce off this deck. Nips back in and beats Finch's cut shot. Big appeal from both the captain and the bowler, but the umpire is unmoved
a shorter ball outside off, Finch misses out on the cut again. This time it had enough room to be clattered to the boundary. Should consider himself lucky

137kph, goes fuller and Finch is stuck in his crease. Blocks and gets it off the bottom of the bat. Warner wants a quick single. Taskin runs forward to field it himself but sends a wild through to long-on
139kph, picked away off leg stump as this was on a length
full and outside off, Finch drills it to mid-off who is on the edge of the circle
walks at him and the slower ball deceives him all ends up. Plays across the line towards midwicket and gets struck on the pads. Taskin appeals, but the batsman had come down the track too far
flights it up on middle, Finch waits on it on the front foot and pushes into the covers. Easy single with the man on the edge of the circle
slog sweep again and it's the same result. Pounded over midwicket as manages to get under it and a clean swing of the arms powers it away
back-to-back! Shakib's figures get dented further as Warner charges him and swings it over midwicket
darted in on off stump, whipped to midiwcket
skips down the track, but Shakib pushes it full and wide. Warner jams an open face down and picks up a single between cover and point
bowls slower to Finch, who is a little more tentative facing him. Presses forward to flick against the turn  and gets hit on the pad
flighted on leg stump, but Warner prefers to stay back and clip it to deep square leg
a bit too much air on this one, also too much room. Finch gets down on one-knee and cart him over midwicket.
darts one in on middle and leg, Finch goes back and blocks

Mushi's certain that was out, he's bewildered at the umpire's decision to rule this not out. And yep, there was a giant edge. This was flatter on off stump and he went back to cut. This almost goes off the face and was well taken by the keeper. Umpire Dharmasena was staunchly shaking his head
short ball, with room outside off again. Rocks back and pulls to thump it to the midwicket boundary
opens the face and carves this behind point
good length ball, angled in on off stump. Pushed to long-on. They wanted a couple, but it wasn't really there

off goes the middle stump and Al-Amin sends Warner off, with a few verbals as well. Good length ball angled in at the stumps as he had switched around the wicket. The batsman went for a pull, when it wasn't really short enough and misses. Middle stump is knocked back and Al-Amin gets in Warner's face while celebrating
good length ball outside off, White was coming forward to defend and gets a thick inside edge behind square leg
this one straightens outside off and Finch gets a thick outside edge to third man to raise the Australian hundred
too short this time and it was high enough to be called a wide. White looks to hook, but can't connect
this was chipped in the air, but falls right between midwicket and mid-on. The ball seemed to hold up on the pitch a little more and White was way too early into the flick
fullish on off, White is forward and blocks towards midwicket
low full toss outside off, Finch drills this through the covers to raise his second fifty of the tournament. This seems to be a match-winning one
fuller delivery slides down leg, and the umpire calls him on it
length ball outside off, Finch slogs it to the deep midwicket boundary. In the arc out of the park stuff now
143kph, fuller ball outside off, pushed down to long-off
short ball and White has pummeled this past the midwicket fielder. His height helped him there to get on top of the ball, even though he was on the front foot
fullish and just outside off, keeps White to a forward push to mid-off
gets nicely forward to the full ball outside off and drives to mid-off
short on off stump, he backs away and slaps it to deep cover
flighted on off stump, White looks for the lap sweep and gets an inside edge. Appeal instantly muted
stays beside this fuller delivery and slaps it to deep point
skips down the track, but he was playing down the wrong line. Wears it on the pads
shortish and outside off, bit of turn there. White uses it and slaps to long-off
stays back despite a bit of flight on this, pushed into the covers
stays quite low! Darted in on middle and leg and White just manages to whip it behind square leg
short ball, slammed to the cover boundary. Made room outside leg and he's muscled this away. No need to keep it down
shortish, but this is quicker. So Finch punches it behind point, along the ground
came forward and pushes this towards point
look out over extra cover! Plantede his front leg outside leg and hammered this over the top, that's the second time he's nailed that shot today
dart outside off stump, cut away to deep point

terrific catch from Nasir, who inspects his right wrist to check for damage. Leg cutter dupes him as Finch backs away and looks to flay this over the covers. Gets more of an edge which soars into the evening sky. Deep point races in, keeps his eyes on the ball all the way through and pouches it safely despite it swirling a little away from him at the last minute
fullish on off stump, defended
short ball, sits up for the pull shot which is nailed by White. Mominul does quite well in the deep and keeps it to two
leg cutter again, steered to third man with an angled face
full and outside off, Maxi nudges it all along the ground to long-on
slower short ball outside off, White has powered this through to the midwicket boundary
slower ball, came out of the back of his hand. Maxi though was waiting for it and he has laced this through midwicket.

misses a full toss and has his stumps in disarray. First T20 wicket for Taskin. Looked to hit across the line towards midwicket and the bat face closed a little too early. Consolation wicket, but Australia are already on the cusp of a... uh, consolation victory
shortish and outside off, dabbed to point
gets it nice and full and just outside off, pushed to short cover
short and wide outside off, Bailey looks to steer it down the third man but only gets a bottom edge to the keeper
ducks back in off a good length and Bailey gets off the mark with an inside edge towards long leg. He's been scratchy all through the tournament
fullish on off stump, pushed down to mid-off
smashes it down the ground, length ball with enough room outside off to pick it up and power it away

over long-off to complete Australia's only victory of the World T20. The two batsmen touch gloves, but there's no real joy there. Al-Amin offers a half-volley that has been blasted out of the ground, Bailey getting a decent hit out there
